en: My taste is quite different from yours.
zh: 我的品味和你挺不一样的。

en: My tastes differ greatly from yours.
zh: 咱俩的品味差得挺远的。

en: My hobby is fishing.
zh: 我喜欢钓鱼。

en: My hobby is music.

en: My hobby is playing the piano.

en: My hobby is collecting coins.

en: My hobby is playing the guitar.
zh: 我喜欢弹吉他。

en: My hobby is writing stories.

en: One of my hobbies is classical music.
zh: 古典音乐是我的爱好之一。

en: One of my hobbies is making artificial flowers.

en: One of my hobbies is collecting old stamps.
zh: 我的爱好之一是收集旧邮票。

en: This is at best the extent of my magic.
zh: 这顶多就是我变魔术的水平了。

en: I asked him to answer soon after he received my letter.
zh: 我让他收到我的信后尽快回信。

en: My letter must have gone astray in the mail.
zh: 我的信肯定寄丢了。

en: My letter should have reached him about this time.
zh: 这会儿我的信应该已经寄到了。

en: My letter made Susie angry.
zh: 我的信惹苏西生气了。

en: My baggage was lost in transit.
zh: 我的行李在运送途中弄丢了。

en: I haven't my dictionary at hand.
zh: 我手头没带词典。

en: Where can I check my luggage in?
zh: 行李托运在哪儿办？

en: I want to know when my baggage is going to arrive.
zh: 我想知道我的行李什么时候能到。

en: I would like to know whether or not my luggage was reshipped to Tokyo.
zh: 我想知道我的行李是不是转运去东京了。

en: Don't let go of my hand.
zh: 别松开我的手。

en: My hand are benumbed with cold.
zh: 我的手冻得没知觉了。

en: It was that dog that bit my hand.
zh: 就是那只狗咬了我的手。

en: My hands and feet were as cold as ice.
zh: 我手脚冰凉。

en: My hand came into contact with her hand.
zh: 我的手碰到了她的手。

en: My master inflicted hard work on me.
zh: 老板让我干很多重活。

en: My primary concern is your safety.
zh: 我最关心的是你的安全。

en: I don't like heavy makeup on a young girl.
zh: 我不喜欢年轻女孩化浓妆。

en: I heartily wish that in my youth I had someone.
zh: 我真希望我年轻的时候能有个人陪。

en: Will you forgive me the debt?
zh: 你能免了我的债吗？

en: There is nothing to hinder me.
zh: 没什么能拦住我。

en: Don't stand in my way.
zh: 别挡我的路。

en: Don't interfere with me.
zh: 别干涉我。

en: I put my car at his disposal.
zh: 我的车随他用。

en: You may use my car.
zh: 你可以用我的车。

en: My car is deficient in horsepower.
zh: 我的车马力不够。
